statements.name: PROC GKPI
DIAL
statements.description: Creates a chart in the dial display type.

statements.name: HBULLET
statements.description: Creates a chart in the horizontal bullet display type.

statements.name: HSLIDER
statements.description: Creates a chart in the horizontal slider display type.

statements.name: HTRAFFICLIGHT
statements.description: Creates a chart in the horizontal traffic light display type.

statements.name: SPEEDOMETER
statements.description: Creates a chart in the speedometer display type.

statements.name: VTRAFFICLIGHT
statements.description: Creates a chart in the vertical traffic light display type.

statements.name: VBULLET
statements.description: Creates a chart in the vertical bullet display type.

statements.name: VSLIDER
statements.description: Creates a chart in the vertical slider display type.

statements.name: QUIT
statements.description: Executes any statements that have not executed and ends the procedure step.
